entry.title: WIND WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in wind prone areas. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:59 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in wind prone areas in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:59 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
